rules_text:
Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | Whenever this creature attacks, create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Draw a card.”)[/i]
[b]Warrior[/b] | Sacrifice an Aether: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
